author: bluelion3
title: Very playable Duplo set
review:
This is a great set for fathers and sons to play with together.

There is a regular figure and a small child figure.  Unfortunately, the adult figure is the exact same one from 5683 (Market Place) that my son already owned.  The child figure is great and somewhat hard to find.  He can sit or stand just like the adult figures. 

They have a tent, fishing pole, fish, canoe, small bear, and campfire.  There aren't many standard Duplo bricks and thus there is not much to build, but there is a lot of playability with the other pieces.  My favorite activity is to put the child in the tent for a nap because my son will start whispering in baby-talk so as not to wake him up.  The tent is made entirely of fabric and seems a little out of place in a Duplo set (or any LEGO set for that matter), but it works. 

The canoe and fishing pole are also fun.  The friendly bear stops by to share some fish.  Be careful, the fire is "hot hot".
